actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of sex or marital status.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Truth in Lending Act, discrimination against individuals seeking credit on account of sex or marital status. Prescribes a penalty for any creditor or card issuer who discriminates against an individual in the manner prohibited by this Act. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 1631)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Truth in Lending Act to prohibit discrimination on account of sex or marital status.
